author: Valli Little
title: Spaghetti marinara
description: Take a shortcut with a good marinara mix, or choose your own favourite seafood

dishes.name: marinara sauce
steps: Heat [#1|2 tbsp|oil] in a large frying pan over medium-low heat and add [#2|4 clove(s)|finely chopped|garlic] and [#3|6|anchovies]. Cook, stirring, for 1-2 minutes until anchovies have melted. Add [#4|800 g|tomatoes] and [#5|200 ml|wine] and bring to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and cook for 20 minutes until slightly reduced.

Add the [#8|200 g|prawns] and remaining [#7|800 g|seafood] and cook for a further 2-3 minutes until the marinara mix and prawns are cooked through. Season to taste with [#10|salt] and [#11|black pepper].

dishes.name: pasta
steps: Meanwhile, cook the [#6|500 g|pasta] in a large pan of boiling salted water according to packet instructions. Drain, then return to the pan and toss in a little [#1|0.5 tbsp|olive oil].
Add the marinara sauce to the drained pasta and toss to combine, then divide among bowls and serve garnished with [#9|torn|parsley leaves].
